resources.string: Ezinye izindawo azikwazanga ukubonakala ngenxa yezinkinga zokuxhumeka kuhleloxhumano
Ayikwazanga ukulanda izithombe kule albhamu. Zama ngemva kwesikhashana.
Le ntwana igcinwa endaweni bese itholakala ungaxhunyiwe kwi-intanethi.
Awukwazi ukusika : ividiyo eqondisiwe yifushane kakhulu
Akukho okuqukethwe okutholakalela ukungeniswa kule divayisi.
Sicela ukhweze isitoreji se-USB ngaphambi kokusebenzisa ikhamera.
Sicela ufake ikhadi le-SD ngaphambi kokusebenzisa ikhamera.
Isitoreji se-USB yakho siphelelwa yisikhala. Shintsha ilungiselelo lekhwalithi noma susa ezinye izithombe noma amanye amafayela.
Ikhadi lakho le-SD liphelelwa isikhathi. Shintsha ilungiselelo lekhwalithi noma susa eminye imifanekiso noma amanye amafayela.
Setha idivayisi yakho phansi.\nIsethe ingabonakali okwesikhashana.
Thinta ukuze uthwebule isithombe ngenkathi uqopha.
Umfanekiso wevidyo awusebenzi uma izinandisi ezikhethekile zivuliwe.
Isici sesikhathi esidlulile sicimile. Sikhanyise ukuze usethe umkhawulo wesikhathi.
Isikali sesikhathi esibala ngokwehla sivaliwe. Sivule ukuze ubale ngokwehla ngaphambi kokuthatha isithombe.
Kubalwa ngokwehla kuze kufike ekuthatheni isithombe
Maka izithombe zakho namavidiyo ngezindawo lapha zithathwe khona.\n\nEzinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zingafinyelela lolu lwazi nezithombe zakho ezilondoloziwe.
